settings.title: Alfa Laval Koltek Valves
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval Koltek Valve is a versatile valve that can be operated either manually or pneumatically. It is designed for use with highly viscous products, those containing large particles, or those with strict pressure loss requirements.

  • Flexible in-line valve with three-port flow diversion
  • Minimized pressure loss
  • Hygienic design
  • Capable of handling products highly viscous, contain large particles, or have strict requirements to minimize pressure loss

The koltek valve is designed for use in the food, chemical,
pharmaceutical and many other industries.

settings.title: Looking for other products or need help to select the right product?
settings.content: We cover the full range of Alfa Laval products and our experts are ready to support you in selecting the right product for your needs - so do not hesitate to reach out!
